mapper.select: SELECT m.id messageId,m.message_content messageContent,m.send_status sendStatus, d.`name` sendStatusName,m.upgrade_time upgradeTime, case (SELECT COUNT(#{userId}) FROM system_message_user WHERE message_os=#{OsType})>0 when 1 then 1 else 0 end isClose FROM system_message m LEFT JOIN dict d on m.send_status=d.dict_code WHERE m.os_type=#{OsType} and m.is_del=0 and (DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d') = FROM_UNIXTIME(m.send_time/1000,'%Y-%m-%d'))
mapper.insert:
insert into system_message_user( message_id, message_os, user_id, is_read, is_del, create_id, create_time, update_id, update_time )values ( #{messageId}, #{messageOs}, #{userId}, #{isRead}, #{isDel}, #{createId}, #{createTime}, #{updateId}, #{updateTime} )
